name: Void Run()
description:
You are Troy McCool, hero of earth.  Aliens have taken over Space Station Omega, and it is up to you to defeat them and save humanity!

A 2D, roguelike, dungeon crawler with turn based combat made using SFML and C++, for set09121 Games Engineering at Edinburgh Napier University.

Game by Alfie Thomasson & Ciaran Brady.

https://github.com/CiaranAndrewBrady/void-Run-

Credit to:

Font - http://typodermicfonts.com/venus-rising-font/

Characters and Misc Assets - https://graphicriver.net/item/complete-futuristic-game-assets-pack-aliens-robots-zombies/17428604?#

Icons and other Assets - https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/gui/icons/spellbook-megapack-109615

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/gui/icons/gui-megapack-101517

Save Icon - https://icons8.com/icons/set/save

Music and SFX - https://www.zapsplat.com/
